messages.title: A FAIRER BRITAIN
messages.content: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the privileged few.

messages.title: TACKLE THE CLIMATE EMERGENCY
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.

messages.title: INVEST IN SCHOOLS AND NHS
messages.content: We will invest part of the £50 billion 'Remain Dividend' in our schools and put 1p on income tax for our NHS and social care.

messages.title: STOP BREXIT
messages.content: End the Brexit mess and keep the best deal we have and stay in Europe.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: End the Brexit mess and keep the best deal we have and stay in Europe.
Alison and the Liberal Democrats will stop Brexit so that we can build a brighter future in Arundel and South Downs.

mentions.candidate: Alison Bennett lives in Arundel & South Downs. In May she defeated the Conservatives in a Tory stronghold at the local elections. She knows how to win here. Alison is not a career politician, only becoming active in politics after the EU referendum; since then she has been fighting to remain in the EU.
mentions.partyLeader: Jo Swinson says 'STOP BREXIT. FOR A BRIGHTER FUTURE'
mentions.tacticalSituation: In May she defeated the Conservatives in a Tory stronghold at the local elections. She knows how to win here.

endorsements.endorsement: STOP BREXIT. FOR A BRIGHTER FUTURE

quotes.text: The Liberal Democrats are winning. Right across the UK, Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats are winning and gaining momentum: GAINED over 700 new councillors in May's local elections. BEAT Labour and the Conservatives in May's European Elections MPs from both Labour and the Conservatives have JOINED the Lib Dems as people abandon the two old parties.

images.caption: Alison Bennett with voters and supporters.
